title: Experiential Continuing Education (CE) Design for Strengthening Psychology Professionals' Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Core psychology theories and practical experience in the field
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing experiential learning applicable to practical settings.

learning_goals: Over 80% of participants recognize the effectiveness of psychology CE programs utilizing experiential teaching methods
Improve the ability to apply learning content to actual work by over 70% through a combination of multiple instructional methods (workshops/case analyses/role-playing)
Achieve average satisfaction scores of 4.0 or higher (on a 5-point scale) among CE completers by measuring learning transfer levels through surveys two months later

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
